task.summary: Default task
Fixed a bug with AllHeroNames JSON being incorrectly written
Fixed a bug with AllHeroNames JSON being incorrectly written
HeroPower - fixed a small bug that caused the burst attack to calculate number of hit creatures incorrectly.
Item management changed to JSON
Item Overwriting Changed to JSON
JSON management should work just fine right now.
New ToDos, minor cleaning.
StackOverflow Exception when selecting a single hero for the dungeon has been fixed.
Item Shop has been also changed to using JSON
Cleaned ToDos, added new ToDos
Added a button that changes the console size
Armor Items have been completed together with some images (these are to be replaced in the future)
Item Factory updated with the new armors
ItemShopGUI - corrections to some bugs with buying items, minor GUI remodelling and bug fixes.
Equipment GUI - after moving an item onto a different item, it no longer overwrites it but reverts the drag and drop events.
Dungen GUI - blood droplets image is now applied onto the bloodied creatures.
Added inheritance hierarchy to some classes, started making the monster animation on monster round.
Monster animations are now triggering upon monsters having their round. The whole thing is laggy though
Monster animation - fixed the lag by deleting thread.sleep, duh.
OnHeroClickAnimation changed so that it only triggers once during the AnimationTimer
Monster AI - monsters are now able to attack a hero when i melee range.
Added inheritance to some classes and encapsulated some fields.
Starting of the distance checking method for monster AI
Monster AI - Distance checker for AI added
Monster AI - Distance checker allows monsters to get closer, but the heroes' id gets overwritten
Monster AI - Distance checker throws stackOverflow on recursive call. Has to get fixed.
Monster AI - monsters now follow the heroes and stop when reaching them, but are still going through walls and not respecting their own speed values.
Monster AI - Monsters take their speed into considerations. Animation work started, but timer has to be set for animation.
Monster AI - animation for monsters is working, but the map is not updating properly at the end f animations
Monster AI - animation got fixed, but monsters are still going through walls.
Power Buttons - disabling a power button now takes place after using a power rather than selecting it
Monster AI - beginning of verification of the distance after walking.
Monster AI - monsters are now hitting the heroes after walking into melee range
Button Grid accessors have been corrected and field has been encapsulated
Monster AI - Monsters are attacking, but the initiative order is bugged due to stack delay. Probably setOnFinished method has to be changed.
Monster AI - Monster turn now ends when colliding with different monsters, which fixed a bug with monster turns.
Cleaned ToDos and added tasks
Centering on active hero works, but still has to be upgraded
New ToDos
Powers are now deselected upon being used up.
Fixed the "please select a power before attacking" reminder message.
Fixing the bloodied creature portrait upon HP being below 50%
Bloodied creature's portraits are now updated straight after their HP is reduced to below 50%
CSS are now working properly on Dungeon GUI
Changed the hero portraits and added hero full arts
Hero full portraits working
GUI Update: started map generation optimizing.
GUI - hero portraits are now updated with red paint upon receiving damage
GUI - monsters dealing damage are causing hero portraits to go red
